title: citta jalArNavattil
sahitya:
citta jalArNavattil jIvap-paDagu sellum shiva perumdurai sEravE


anupallavi

  bhattit-tuDuppinai balamAga nATTiyE paraman aruLE kalangarai viLakkAga]


caraNam    AngArak-koDum puyal aDittu norukkAmal Ashait-timingilangaL angAndu vizhungAmal
 OmkAra alaiyilE tUngAdu senru nal udaya vELaiyilE idayat-teLivu kANa
